text: I think the main design flaw here is that I'm approaching this with a density function instead of plain terrain marching. Initially I wanted to add some fluid stuff inside and discarded it later, but didn't change the way I marched. Next time I'll be more careful!
Thx! Yeah it's being marched in the Image tab, but it has tons of aliasing issues, so I added some roughness... but I'm not entirely happy with it.
wow, very nice! the reflection seems a bit low res. could it be done completely in Image tab?
